value: Shalom Shalom it's the 24th day of the
8p per month this is daniel john lee
with tour restoration ministries it's
tuesday night now the fourth day of the
week november the 26 2013 and i've been
having a lot of people on campus and on
the internet say that have been cut off
from my children for all these different
reasons and I want to just dispel this
right now I wrote this letter over a
year ago to the Honorable Judge nor be
after she made the decision to cut me
off for my six children in clackamas
county court and i want to read this
letter I never sent this the judge nor
be I just wrote this as an emotional
release but I want to read this letter
and it will clearly explain why my six
children were cut off from me and why
I'm never able to contact them dear
Honorable Judge Norbie of clackamas
county your decision on October
thirtieth 2012 was this Daniel I will
never allow you to see or even speak
with her children unless you agree never
to read or teach them the Bible your
ex-wife is now an atheist and I will not
allow her to be offended by you teaching
your children from the Bible yet judge
nor be my very Bible which I hold so
dear commands me to teach my children
about the Bible to ask me to compromise
on this means you are asking you to
throw away the very heart and soul of
why I am a father to teach my children
how to love Jesus Christ of Nazareth and
how to obey Him and you asked me to
cease doing this you asked me to make
this deal with the devil in order to see
my children that is very very very wrong
of you to do you told me I was welcome
to appeal your wicked decision to the
Oregon Court of Appeals yet it costs
five hundred dollars and requires much
paperwork I barely have enough money
every month to pay my huge child support
bill yet my ex-wife has all the money in
the world as her wicked family hires one
high-powered attorney after another
judge nor be your very wrong decision
has broken my heart with grief can you
cut me off for my children when I pay my
taxes when I work hard when I loyally
pay much
I'll support every month when all I want
to do is share my deeply held beliefs
with my precious children how can you do
this my state licensed therapist even
testified under oath that in her
professional opinion after seeing me for
a full year that I had absolutely no
mental illnesses yet you completely
rejected our testimony this therapist is
not even a Christian yet even she told
you I have no mental illnesses how could
you do this I will pray that you repent
judge nor be as I do for all those who
have cut me off from my children no I
will never break this restraining order
that you have placed between me and my
children but I do know that when I go
into eternity to be with my lord and
savior jesus christ of nazareth that i
will be able to stand before him with a
clear conscience that I did all I could
to be a father to my children and I
trust and believe that my six children
will one day someday see that their dad
loves them much and eventually they will
seek me out of course I wrote that over
a year ago and now I realized that my
children aren't even going to be adults
Isaiah is not even going to be 17 when
Yahshua returns and returns for his
bright so hallelujah on that but that's
the letter I wrote to judge nor be as an
emotional release I didn't send it to
the judge because I know she wasn't she
wouldn't even accept it but my therapist
wanted me to write this and I sent it to
my probation officer and all this good
stuff but I this is the letter I wrote
so this is the truth this is why I can't
see my children alright so you know if
the Oregon justice system and the Oregon
Court system wants to place themselves
against Yahweh and against the Holy
Bible that's their problem and you how
it will deal with them this is daniel
john lee with tour restoration
ministries the websites ww spirit and
Torah com Shalom
